title: How to Take CBD Oil for Appetite

steps.headline: Check with your doctor before you begin taking CBD oil.
steps.description: Even though CBD oil is available over-the-counter in many places, it may not be a good option for everyone. It’s best to discuss your appetite issues with your doctor before you start taking CBD oil. Your doctor may suggest an alternative to taking CBD oil since CBD oil has not been shown to be effective for increasing appetite.Tip: Your doctor may also recommend other therapies for stimulating your appetite if it’s being caused by a medical condition, such as anorexia, AIDS, or cancer.

steps.headline: Avoid taking CBD oil if you're on certain medications.
steps.description:
CBD oil can interact with some medications, which could result in a worsening of your condition. Interactions may include causing the medication not to work properly or intensifying its effects. Medications that are known to interact with CBD oil include:
Omeprazole
Risperidone
Warfarin
Diclofenac
Ketoconazole

steps.headline: Ask your doctor about taking dronabinol for appetite instead.
steps.description: This is a prescription cannabinoid medication that has been shown to increase appetite. This may be more effective than taking an over-the-counter CBD oil, and your insurance may even cover the medication if it’s for a diagnosed medical condition such as cancer or anorexia. The brand name for dronabinol is Marinol. This drug is available with a prescription anywhere in the United States, even if marijuana is illegal in your state.

steps.headline: Inhale CBD oil in an e-cigarette or vaporizer if you prefer.
steps.description: Inhaling your CBD oil might be a good choice for you if you already use a vaporizer or e-cigarette on a regular basis. Choose a form of CBD oil that you can add to your vape pen and follow the manufacturer’s instructions for how to use it. This is the quickest way to get CBD into your system. You may start to feel the mild sedative effects of it within minutes.Tip: Try asking friends and family members what forms of CBD oil they recommend if you’re overwhelmed by the choices.

steps.headline: Opt for CBD oil spray for something that’s quick and easy to use.
steps.description: If you don’t want to eat your CBD oil, you can also try using a spray, which you administer by spraying it under your tongue. If you are looking for something quick and convenient, this might be the best choice for you. This is also a quick way to get CBD oil into your system. You may feel the mild sedative effects within a few minutes after administering it. Make sure to follow the manufacturer’s instructions for how to use the CBD oil and don’t administer more than the recommended dose.

steps.headline: Choose an edible form of CBD oil if you like the taste.
steps.description: CBD oil products come in the form of flavored lozenges, gummies, honey, and even CBD oil-infused coffees. If you find an edible CBD oil that you like, go with that option. It will help to make taking it more pleasant and you may even experience a boost in appetite just from eating something. Try out different products until you find something you like. Note that it may take around 30 minutes to feel the effects of CBD oil if you eat it.

steps.headline: Consult with your doctor again if CBD oil doesn’t improve your appetite.
steps.description: Pay attention to how you feel after taking CBD oil. If you don’t notice an increase in appetite after using CBD oil, then it might not be working for you. Talk to your doctor to find out what other options you have for increasing your appetite.
